      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az idegi és a hormonális szabályozás alapjai</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Basics Of Nerval And Hormonal Control</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Grundlagen Von Nerval Und Von Hormonaler 
Steuerung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Fondations de Nerval et de Commande Hormonale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Princípios De Nerval E Do Controle Hormonal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I Principi fondamentali Di Nerval E Di Controllo 
Ormonale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα βασικά του νευρικού και ορμονικού ελέγχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Fundamentos De Nerval Y Del Control Hormonal</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az idegi és a hormonális szabályozás; a hormonok és a hormonhatás kialakulása; az idegsejtek szerkezete, szinapszis, az elemi idegi jelenségek (akciós potenciál kialakulása és terjedése)</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Nervous and Hormonal Control; Hormones and Hormone Effect; Structure of Nerve Cells, Synapsis, Basic Nervous Phenomena (Spreading of Action Potential)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">egészséges életmódra nevelés</string>
            <string language="en-US">healhty lifestyle education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">idegi szabályozás</string>
            <string language="en-US">nervous coordination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">hormonális szabályozás</string>
            <string language="en-US">hormonal control</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die nervöse und hormonale Steuerung; Hormone
und Hormon-Effekt; Struktur der Nerv Zellen, Synapse, 
grundlegende nervöse Phänomene (Verbreiten des Aktionspotentials)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La commande nerveuse et hormonale ; Hormones
et effet d'hormone ; Structure des cellules de nerf, synapse, 
phénomènes nerveux de base (propagation du potentiel d'action)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O controle nervoso e hormonal; Hormones e 
efeito do hormone; Estrutura de pilhas do nervo, sinapse, 
fenômenos nervosos básicos (espalhar do potencial de ação)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il controllo nervoso ed ormonale; Ormoni ed 
effetto dell'ormone; Struttura delle cellule del nervo, sinapsi,
fenomeni nervosi di base (diffusione del potenziale di azione)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο νευρικός και ορμονικός έλεγχος  Ορμόνες και 
επίδραση ορμονών  Δομή των κυττάρων νεύρων, Synapsis, 
βασικά νευρικά φαινόμενα (διάδοση της δυνατότητας ενέργειας)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El control nervioso y hormonal; Hormonas y 
efecto de la hormona; Estructura de las células del nervio, 
sinapsis, fenómenos nerviosos básicos (el separarse del potencial de
acción)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">healhty Lebensstil Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nervöse Korrdination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hormonale Steuerung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation healhty de style de vie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">coordination nerveuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commande hormonale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução healhty do lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">coordenação nervosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">controle hormonal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione healhty di lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">coordinazione nervosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">controllo ormonale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">healhty εκπαίδευση τρόπου ζωής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νευρικός συντονισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορμονικός έλεγχος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">educación healhty de la forma de vida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">coordinación nerviosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">control hormonal</string>
          </keyword>
